Instruction: In a saucepan, combine redcurrants, water, sugar, and lemon zest.
Bring the mixture to a simmer over medium heat.
Reduce the heat to low and let it cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the redcurrants have softened and the sauce has thickened.
Remove the saucepan from heat and let the redcurrant sauce cool slightly.
Transfer the sauce to a blender or food processor and blend until smooth.
Strain the sauce through a fine mesh sieve to remove seeds.
Allow the sauce to cool completely before serving.
